head.title: A Quiet Solution: Analyze the Crinklers

hedline.hl1: A Quiet Solution: Analyze the Crinklers

abstract.p: James Enterline letter offers technique for opening crinkly wrappers without disturbing other theater-goers (S)

block.p: Your June 1 news article about candy-wrapper crinklers at opera, theater and concerts suggests that there is no hope of silencing them. The finding that the noise is made up of short, high-frequency pulses makes it completely controllable by the procedure that I regularly use.

Hold your legs together and hold the wrapped candy closely underneath them with both hands while you unwrap it by feel. Your clothing and body will completely shield the high-frequency noise from your neighbors.
Also important, wait for a loud rather than a soft part of the music to do it.
